Verify that tabbed editor doesn't shuffle tabs when bindings are dropped and then re-added during reload.


Running: waitForBindings

Running: openNetworkFiles
initial tabs:
    1: foo.js
    2: bar.js
    3: baz.js [selected]

Running: reloadPage
Page reloaded.
Tabs after reload:
    1: foo.js
    2: bar.js
    3: baz.js [selected]
